701331f-a.title: Bronx: Jerome Avenue - Anderson Avenue
701331f-a.text:
Jerome Ave. (running from extreme left, where ''For Property'' sign
aupears, to rimht, where domed house stands), north from Anderson Ave.,
to East 162nd Street. The two low frame houses, on the west side of the
avenue, adjoining Anderson Ave., bear Nos. 7 and 9. The domed building
is Huber's Hotel, at the N.E. corner of East 162nd Street; Jerome Ave.
passing the hotel on the left. In the center of the view are shown the
rears of 5-story houses, facing on the east side of Anderson Ave. Shown
in the foreground is the approach to the Macombs Dam Bridge running
through Macombs Dam Park (partially visible). Occupying the west side
of Jerome Ave. at this date (1938), is an 8-story apartment house.
About 1913.
James Suydam.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
